metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12865 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Stack-based buffer overflow in "dnsproxy.c" in connman 1.34 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) or execute arbitrary code via a crafted response query string passed to the "name" variable.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12865` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

connman - 1.21-1.2+deb8u1build0.16.04.1
connman-vpn - 1.21-1.2+deb8u1build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: connman package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.21-1.2+deb8u1build0.16.04.1').
